reference.title: Version and support information
reference.shortdesc: The following extension points are used by convention to define version and support info within a plug-in.

note.p: The toolkit does not currently do anything with these values, but may do so in the future.

section.p: The package.version value should follow the syntax rules:
section.codeblock:
version ::= major ( '.' minor ( '.' micro ( '.' qualifier )? )? )?
major ::= number minor ::= number micro ::= number qualifier ::= ( [0..9] | [a..zA..Z] | ’_’ | '-' )+

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <plugin id="com.example.WithSupportInfo"> <feature extension="package.support.name" value="Joe the Author"/> <feature extension="package.support.email" value="joe@example.com"/> <feature extension="package.version" value="1.2.3"/> </plugin>
